nodes.documentation:
@title Simple implementation of TCRs
@author Team Xivis <xivis.com>
nodes.name: SimpleTCR

nodes.documentation:
@dev Initializer. Can only be called once.
@param token The address where the ERC20 token contract is deployed
nodes.name: init

nodes.documentation:
Determines whether the given listingHash be whitelisted.
@param _listingHash The listingHash whose status is to be examined
nodes.name: canBeWhitelisted
whitelistApplication
resolveChallenge

nodes.documentation:
Determines the number of tokens awarded to the winning party in a challenge.
@param _challengeID The challengeID to determine a reward for
nodes.name: determineReward

nodes.documentation:
Updates a listingHash status from 'application' to 'listing' or resolves a challenge if one exists.
@param _listingHash The listingHash whose status is being updated
nodes.name: updateStatus
challenge
requestVotingRights
isExpired
votePeriodActive
vote
claimChallengeReward

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Challenge must be resolved before trying to claim the reward"

arguments.value: Challenge must be resolved before trying to claim the reward

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Challenge must be resolved before trying to claim the reward"

nodes.name: claimVoterReward

nodes.documentation:
Deletes a listingHash from the whitelist and transfers remaining tokens back to owner
@param _listingHash The listing hash to delete
nodes.name: resetListing
exit

nodes.documentation:
Determines if a listingHash is whitelisted
@param _listingHash of an application
nodes.name: isWhitelisted
challengeExists
challengeEnded

nodes.documentation:
Determines whether voting has concluded in a challenge for a given listingHash. Throws if no challenge exists.
@param _listingHash A listingHash with an unresolved challenge
nodes.name: challengeCanBeResolved

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Challenge must be resolved before trying to claim the reward"

arguments.value: Challenge must be resolved before trying to claim the reward

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Challenge must be resolved before trying to claim the reward"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Challenge must be resolved before trying to claim the reward"

arguments.value: Challenge must be resolved before trying to claim the reward

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Challenge must be resolved before trying to claim the reward"

nodes.name: challengeReward

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Challenge must be resolved before trying to claim the reward"

arguments.value: Challenge must be resolved before trying to claim the reward

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Challenge must be resolved before trying to claim the reward"

nodes.name: challengeSucceeded

nodes.documentation:
Returns true if apply was called for this listingHash
@param _listingHash The listingHash whose status is to be examined
nodes.name: appWasMade
